title: [118. Pascal's Triangle](https://leetcode.cn/problems/pascals-triangle/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
118. Pascal’s Triangle Description Given an integer numRows, return the first numRows of Pascal's triangle.
In Pascal's triangle, each number is the sum of the two numbers directly above it as shown:
 
Example 1:
Input: numRows = 5 Output: [[1],[1,1],[1,2,1],[1,3,3,1],[1,4,6,4,1]] Example 2:
Input: numRows = 1 Output: [[1]]  
Constraints:
1 <= numRows <= 30 Related Topics Array Dynamic Programming Similar Questions Pascal’s Triangle II
